description:
Madden NFL 22 is where gameday happens. It’s everything you love about the NFL injected into every mode via ALL-NEW Dynamic Gameday. 

Whether you’re strategizing for a matchup in the redeveloped Franchise mode, going head-to-head in Play Now, or competing online in Madden Ultimate Team, you’ll feel Dynamic Gameday impact gameplay everywhere in Madden NFL 22.

Next Gen Stats Star-Driven AI
- The smartest gameplay ever in Madden NFL 22 is enabled by Next Gen Stats Star-Driven AI. Powered by real life data for a more realistic experience, the new AI behavior  in Madden NFL 22 enables seriously smarter gameplay built to emulate varying player and team tendencies. 

Gameday Atmosphere
- Feel a whole new vibe from the sidelines to the seats in Madden NFL 22 with Gameday Atmosphere. Experience Home Field Advantage* modifiers in NFL stadiums that, when triggered, can swing momentum into (or out of) your favor. Plus, new on-field reactions and player personas add intensity to the drama and affect momentum during pressure moments.

Face of the Franchise: Unified Progression
- Earn the No. 1 overall pick and expect the unexpected as you adapt to the weekly routine as an NFL rookie. Play like a superstar on the field and use your influence to become a hero off of it as you progress. With new unified avatar progression and player class systems, all your progress is shared between Face of the Franchise and The Yard. Choose a class and player physique that best fits your play style. Earn rep through gameplay to level up. Unlock X-Factor abilities and strategically spend skill points that you can equip to power up your avatar. 

This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire a random selection of virtual in-game items.

CONDITIONS AND RESTRICTIONS APPLY. SEE https://www.easports.com/madden-nfl/game-disclaimers FOR DETAILS.
